query: select top(1) PerC.UniqueId Ent, '' OR1 from PersonCards PerC where PerC.IsDeleted != 1 and PerC.Kell is null
select top(1) PerC.UniqueId Ent, '-' OR1 from PersonCards PerC where PerC.IsDeleted != 1 and PerC.Kell = '-1' and PerC.Chellano is null
select top(1) PerC.UniqueId Ent, '-' OR1 from PersonCards PerC where PerC.IsDeleted != 1 and PerC.Kell = '-1' and PerC.Chellano = '-1'
select top(1) PerC.UniqueId Ent, '-+' OR1 from PersonCards PerC where PerC.IsDeleted != 1 and PerC.Kell = '-1' and PerC.Chellano = '1'
select top(1) PerC.UniqueId Ent, '+' OR1 from PersonCards PerC where PerC.IsDeleted != 1 and PerC.Kell = '1' and PerC.Chellano is null
select top(1) PerC.UniqueId Ent, '+-' OR1 from PersonCards PerC where PerC.IsDeleted != 1 and PerC.Kell = '1' and PerC.Chellano = '-1'
select top(1) PerC.UniqueId Ent, '++' OR1 from PersonCards PerC where PerC.IsDeleted != 1 and PerC.Kell = '1' and PerC.Chellano = '1'
